{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$1.3M in 2021-2022 on contracts with OXFORD ECONOMICS USA.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [OXFORD ECONOMICS USA INC](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22OXFORD%20ECONOMICS%20USA%20INC%22)
- [Oxford Economics USA INC](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Oxford%20Economics%20USA%20INC%22)
- [Oxford Economics USA Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Oxford%20Economics%20USA%20Inc.%22)
- [Oxford Economics USA, Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Oxford%20Economics%20USA%2c%20Inc.%22)
{{< /details >}}
